DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, END_DT, ROW_STATUS, MODEL_IND, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_FAMILY, BENEFIT_PLAN, STRUCTURE, STANDARD_PLAN_CD, CORPORATE_PLAN_CD, VARIATION, VALUE_ID, CONTRACT_STATUS, ADJUDICATION_IND, GROUP_NM, GROUP_STATE_HQ, SHOW_NOTES_IND, BENEFIT_YEAR_ACCUM_IND, DOC_COMPLIANCE_IND, GMIS_IND, MULTI_PLAN_IND, BENEFIT_INQ_IND, BENEFIT_STRUCTURE, COMMENTS, NOTE, CREATION_USERID, CREATION_DT, LAST_UPDATED_USERID, LAST_UPDATED_DT, ADJ_LAST_UPDATED_DT, ITS_HOME_ADJ_IND, SEND_TO_MF_IND, COB_ADJUD_IND, MEDICARE_ADJUD_IND, BUSINESS_ENTITY, ASO_IND, GUARANTEE_IND, CNTRC_STAT, PROD_IND, TEST_IND FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = ? AND START_DT = ? AND CNTRC_STAT LIKE ? AND ROW_STATUS != 0
SELECT contract, start_dt, benefit_year_accum_ind FROM contract WHERE contract = {0} AND start_dt = TO_DATE({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')
SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND ROW_STATUS != 0 AND CNTRC_STAT = 'Schedule to Test'
SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND ROW_STATUS != 0 AND CNTRC_STAT = 'Transferred to Production'
SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND ROW_STATUS != 0 AND CNTRC_STAT != 'Migrated'
SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND ROW_STATUS != 0 AND CNTRC_STAT = 'Schedule to Production'
SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND ROW_STATUS != 0 AND (BENEFIT_STRUCTURE is null or trim(BENEFIT_STRUCTURE) = '' )

SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, END_DT, ROW_STATUS, MODEL_IND, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_FAMILY, BENEFIT_PLAN, STANDARD_PLAN_CD, CORPORATE_PLAN_CD, GROUP_NM, GROUP_STATE_HQ, BENEFIT_YEAR_ACCUM_IND, BENEFIT_STRUCTURE, CREATION_USERID, CREATION_DT, LAST_UPDATED_USERID,LAST_UPDATED_DT, BUSINESS_ENTITY, CNTRC_STAT, ITS_HOME_ADJ_IND, COB_ADJUD_IND, MEDICARE_ADJUD_IND FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND CNTRC_STAT LIKE {1} AND ROW_STATUS != 0 ORDER BY END_DT, START_DT DESC

SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, END_DT, ROW_STATUS, MODEL_IND, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_FAMILY, BENEFIT_PLAN, STANDARD_PLAN_CD, CORPORATE_PLAN_CD, GROUP_NM, GROUP_STATE_HQ, BENEFIT_YEAR_ACCUM_IND, BENEFIT_STRUCTURE, CREATION_USERID, CREATION_DT, LAST_UPDATED_USERID,LAST_UPDATED_DT, BUSINESS_ENTITY, CNTRC_STAT FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND CNTRC_STAT LIKE {1} AND ROW_STATUS != 0 AND START_DT = TO_DATE({2},'mm/dd/yyyy')
SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND ROW_STATUS = 1

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE CONTRACT SET ROW_STATUS = ?, CNTRC_STAT = ?, END_DT = ?, LAST_UPDATED_USERID = ?, LAST_UPDATED_DT = ? WHERE CONTRACT = ? AND START_DT = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT_ID, LOCK_USR, LOCK_TMS, CREATE_DATE, CREATION_USERID, LAST_UPDATED_USERID, LAST_UPDATED_DT, CREATION_DT FROM CNTRC_LCK_TBL WHERE CONTRACT_ID = ?
SELECT contract_id, lock_usr FROM cntrc_lck_tbl WHERE contract_id = UPPER({0}) AND lock_usr = {1}

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO CNTRC_LCK_TBL ( CONTRACT_ID, LOCK_USR, LOCK_TMS, CREATE_DATE, CREATION_USERID, LAST_UPDATED_USERID, LAST_UPDATED_DT, CREATION_DT) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE CNTRC_LCK_TBL SET LOCK_USR = ?, LOCK_TMS = ?, LAST_UPDATED_USERID = ?, LAST_UPDATED_DT = ?, CREATION_DT = ? WHERE CONTRACT_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT benefit_structure, major_heading, major_text, display_sequence, creation_userid, creation_dt, last_updated_userid, last_updated_dt FROM major_heading WHERE benefit_structure = {0} AND major_text LIKE (UPPER ({1}) || '%') ORDER BY major_text

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT benefit_structure, major_heading, minor_heading, minor_text, display_sequence, creation_userid, creation_dt, last_updated_userid, last_updated_dt, svcdflgs FROM minor_heading WHERE major_heading = {0} AND minor_text LIKE (UPPER ({1}) || '%') ORDER BY minor_text

SELECT benefit_structure, major_heading, minor_heading, minor_text, display_sequence, creation_userid, creation_dt, last_updated_userid, last_updated_dt, svcdflgs FROM minor_heading WHERE benefit_structure = {0} AND minor_text LIKE (UPPER ({1}) || '%') ORDER BY minor_text

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, COVERAGE, PRICING, NETWORK, CREATION_USERID, CREATION_DT, LAST_UPDATED_USERID, LAST_UPDATED_DT FROM PRICING WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT D.CONTRACT_VAR, D.CONT_VAR_TX, D.LONG_TEXT, D.CONTRACT_VAR_FORMAT, D.PROV_ARNG , (select VAR_VALUE from VARSEG where CONTRACT_VAR = D.CONTRACT_VAR and CONTRACT = {0} and START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy') and VAR_VALUE != ' ' ) VAR_VALUE, (SELECT 'Y' as contract_var FROM bennotes WHERE contract_var = D.contract_var AND contract = {0} AND start_dt = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy') AND ((note IS NOT NULL) OR (TO_CHAR(note) != ' '))) NOTE_VAR FROM --MAJOR_HEADING A, --MINOR_HEADING B, CONTRACT_DETAIL C, CONTVAR D WHERE -- A.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE = 2 -- AND A.MAJOR_HEADING = AND -- AND A.MAJOR_HEADING = B.MAJOR_HEADING -- AND B.MINOR_HEADING = C.MINOR_HEADING C.MINOR_HEADING like {2} AND C.CONTRACT_VAR = D.CONTRACT_VAR AND D.CONTRACT_VAR like {3} AND D.CONTRACT_VAR_FORMAT like {4} AND D.PROV_ARNG like {5}

SELECT D.CONTRACT_VAR, D.CONT_VAR_TX, D.LONG_TEXT, D.CONTRACT_VAR_FORMAT, D.PROV_ARNG , E.VAR_VALUE , (SELECT 'Y' as contract_var FROM bennotes WHERE contract_var = d.contract_var AND contract = {0} AND start_dt = TO_DATE ({1}, 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND ((note IS NOT NULL) OR (TO_CHAR(note) != ' '))) NOTE_VAR FROM CONTVAR D, VARSEG E WHERE E.CONTRACT = {0} AND E.START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy') AND E.CONTRACT_VAR = D.CONTRACT_VAR and E.VAR_VALUE != ' '

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, LIMIT_CLASS FROM LIMIT_CLASS_EXCLUSION WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, SERVICE_CLASS_FROM, SERVICE_CLASS_THRU FROM SERVICE_CLASS_EXCLUSION WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, SERVICE_CODE FROM SERVICE_CODE_EXCLUSION WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, SPECIALTY_CODE FROM SPECIALTY_CODE_EXCLUSION WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE CONTRACT SET ROW_STATUS = ?, CNTRC_STAT = ?, LAST_UPDATED_USERID = ?, LAST_UPDATED_DT = ? WHERE CONTRACT = ? AND CNTRC_STAT LIKE ? AND ROW_STATUS != 0

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, TST_PROD_IND, CREATION_USERID, CREATION_DT, LAST_UPDATED_USERID, LAST_UPDATED_DT FROM MGRTD_DT_SGMNT WHERE CONTRACT = ? AND START_DT = ?

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO MGRTD_DT_SGMNT ( CONTRACT, START_DT, TST_PROD_IND, CREATION_USERID, CREATION_DT, LAST_UPDATED_USERID, LAST_UPDATED_DT) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT, START_DT, NOTE FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CONTRACT.CONTRACT,to_char(CONTRACT.START_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),MAJOR_HEADING.MAJOR_HEADING,MAJOR_TEXT FROM MAJOR_HEADING,CONTRACT,MAJOR_NOTES WHERE CONTRACT.CONTRACT = {0} AND CONTRACT.START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy') AND MAJOR_HEADING.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE = CONTRACT.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE AND MAJOR_NOTES.MAJOR_HEADING = MAJOR_HEADING.MAJOR_HEADING AND MAJOR_NOTES.CONTRACT = {0} AND MAJOR_NOTES.START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy') AND MAJOR_NOTES.NOTE IS NOT NULL

SELECT CONTRACT,to_char(START_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),MAJOR_HEADING,MAJOR_TEXT FROM MAJOR_HEADING,CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy') AND MAJOR_HEADING.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE = CONTRACT.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT MINOR_HEADING.MINOR_HEADING,MINOR_HEADING.MINOR_TEXT FROM MINOR_HEADING,CONTRACT,MINOR_NOTES WHERE CONTRACT.CONTRACT = {0} AND CONTRACT.START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy') AND MINOR_HEADING.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE = CONTRACT.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE AND MINOR_HEADING.MAJOR_HEADING = {2} AND MINOR_NOTES.MINOR_HEADING = MINOR_HEADING.MINOR_HEADING AND MINOR_NOTES.MAJOR_HEADING = MINOR_HEADING.MAJOR_HEADING AND MINOR_NOTES.CONTRACT = {0} AND MINOR_NOTES.START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy') AND MINOR_NOTES.NOTE IS NOT NULL

SELECT a.minor_heading, a.minor_text FROM minor_heading a, minor_notes b, contract c WHERE a.major_heading = (SELECT major_heading FROM minor_heading WHERE minor_heading = {0}) and c.CONTRACT = {1} AND C.START_DT = to_date({2},'mm/dd/yyyy') and a.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE = c.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE And b.MAJOR_HEADING = a.MAJOR_HEADING AND b.MINOR_HEADING = a.MINOR_HEADING AND b.CONTRACT = {1} AND b.START_DT = to_date({2},'mm/dd/yyyy') AND b.NOTE IS NOT NULL

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT MAJOR_HEADING,NOTE FROM MAJOR_NOTES WHERE CONTRACT = ? AND START_DT = to_date(?,'mm/dd/yyyy') AND MAJOR_HEADING = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT MINOR_HEADING,NOTE FROM MINOR_NOTES WHERE CONTRACT = ? AND START_DT = to_date(?,'mm/dd/yyyy') AND MINOR_HEADING = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select MAJOR_HEADING.MAJOR_TEXT,MINOR_HEADING.MINOR_TEXT,CONTRACT_DETAIL.CONTRACT_VAR, CONTVAR.CONT_VAR_TX,CONTVAR.PROV_ARNG,CONTVAR.CONTRACT_VAR_FORMAT,VARSEG.VAR_VALUE from CONTRACT_DETAIL,MAJOR_HEADING,MINOR_HEADING,CONTVAR,VARSEG where CONTRACT_DETAIL.MAJOR_HEADING = MAJOR_HEADING.MAJOR_HEADING and CONTRACT_DETAIL.MINOR_HEADING = MINOR_HEADING.MINOR_HEADING and MAJOR_HEADING.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE = (SELECT BENEFIT_STRUCTURE FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy'))and MINOR_HEADING.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE = (SELECT BENEFIT_STRUCTURE FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')) and CONTRACT_DETAIL.BENEFIT_STRUCTURE = (SELECT BENEFIT_STRUCTURE FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT = {0} AND START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')) and CONTRACT_DETAIL.CONTRACT_VAR = CONTVAR.CONTRACT_VAR and VARSEG.CONTRACT_VAR = CONTVAR.CONTRACT_VAR and VARSEG.CONTRACT = {0} and VARSEG.START_DT = to_date({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')and VARSEG.CONTRACT_VAR NOT {2} order by MAJOR_HEADING.DISPLAY_SEQUENCE, MINOR_HEADING.DISPLAY_SEQUENCE,CONTRACT_DETAIL.CONTRACT_VAR
